Replace.Text: The king of Qin swept Liuhe, what a majestic sight! Swing your sword to cut through the floating clouds, and all the princes will come to the west. The clear judgment comes from the apocalypse, and the roughness leads to the talents. Withdraw the troops and cast the golden man, and open Han Valley due to the east.

Producing builders will get an additional builder. In addition, the improvement facilities improved by the builder have the following additional bonuses [NEWLINE] Farmland +2[ICON_CULTURE] cultural value, 2[ICON_Food] food value, 2[ICON_Gold] gold coin value[NEWLINE] ] Ranch +2 [ICON_Science] technology value, 2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value [NEWLINE] Fishing boat +2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value, 2 [ICON_Food] food value, 2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value [NEWLINE] Mine +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 2 [ICON_Science] technology value, 2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value [NEWLINE] Camp +2 [ICON_Science] technology value, 2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value, 2 [ICON_Food] food value [NEWLINE] Planting Park +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coin value, 2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value [NEWLINE] Lumberyard +2 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value, 2 [ICON_Food] food value, 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coin value [NEWLINE] Quarry +2[ICON_Gold] gold value, 2[ICON_Science] technology value, 2[ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity
